title: I Know a secret (K)
creator_credit: Atlantis Films, Michael Macmillan, Seaton McLean, Janice Platt and Bruce Pittman
brief_description: A film adaptation of a short story by Lucy Maud Montgomery set during the late 1930s. The story is about a young girl called Jane Lawrence, and some children she becomes acquainted with after she moves to the country with her mother to live.
creator_credit_for_label: Atlantis Films, Michael Macmillan, Seaton McLean, Janice Platt and Bruce Pittman
